titles.title: A resolution commending the University of West Florida Argonauts football team for its National Collegiate Athletic Association Division II national championship victory.
A resolution commending the University of West Florida Argonauts football team for its National Collegiate Athletic Association Division II national championship victory.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary: This resolution commends the University of West Florida Argonauts football team for its National Collegiate Athletic Association Division II national championship victory.
